snippet: The argument for developing an investment policy statement that fits your future financial needs no matter how the economy behaves.
abstract: Developing an investment policy statement is a useful way to avoid obstacles on the path to retirement; financial planners and investment advisers have used such road maps for years, helping people focus on their retirement goals.
lead_paragraph: The argument for developing an investment policy statement that fits your future financial needs no matter how the economy behaves.
